missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block line of sight to the Incinerator Troopers.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Fires rage throughout the homestead, and Jawas and farmers flee in terror from advancing Imperial troops. You might be able to salvage some of what remains standing, but only if you hurry.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.tbText: As you enter the moisture farm, you see Princess Leia Organa standing at a window, peering out, a wet cloth draped over her mouth to keep the smoke out. "Finally", she says, breathing a sigh of relief when she sees you. "I was worried you wouldn't come."
Outside, troopers in white, fireproof armor are scorching the homestead with massive flamethrowers.
{-} Imperial Mission tokens represent Incinerator Troopers.

eventActions.bonuses:
SQUAD TRAINING: While attacking, each figure in this group gains Pierce 1. If the target has already been attacked during this group's activation, they gain Pierce 2 instead.
SCORCHED EARTH: After this activation, place another fire in an empty space adjacent to you.
eventActions.abilities:
COMPOSITE PLATING:While defending, if the attacker is 4 or more spaces away, apply +1 {G} to the defense roll.
FIREPROOF: This figure does not suffer {H} from entering spaces containing a fire. It can voluntarily end its movement in a space containing a fire.
eventActions.customText:
{-} LAST STAND: If there are fewer than 3 figures in this group, become <color="red">Focused</color>. Limit once per group activation.
{-} FIREPROOF: This figure does not suffer {H} from entering spaces containing a fire. It can voluntarily end its movement in a space containing a fire.
{Q} Move 1 to attack {rebel}.
{A} Move 2 toward the closest Homestead Tile without a fire.
{A} Move 4 toward the closest Homestead Tile without a fire.
{-} Place 1 fire in an empty space adjacent to you. If possible, target a space on a Homestead Tile without a fire.

eventActions.tbText: Fires are already raging in the homestead.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent fires.
{-} When a figure enters a space containing a fire, that figure suffers 2 {H}. Figures cannot voluntarily end their movement in a space containing a fire.
{-} All tiles with at least 12 spaces are Homestead tiles (Core: 2B, 3B, 4B, 6B, 8B; Hoth: 2B, 4B).
{-} At the end of each Round, the Imperial player gains {D} for each Homestead tile containing 1 or more fires.

You quickly grab some fire extinguishers and rush out to meet the troopers.

{-} Healthy Rebel figures gain {A}: Choose 1 fire within 2 spaces of you and discard it. Then, if you are a hero, you may test {J}. If the test is passed, you may choose 1 additional fire within 2 spaces of you and discard it.
{-} The Rebels win when the Incinerator Troopers are defeated and there are no fires on the map.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.shortText: Defeat the Incinerator Troopers. Extinguish all fires.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent fires.
{-} When a figure enters a space containing a fire, that figure suffers 2 {H}. Figures cannot voluntarily end their movement in a space containing a fire.
{-} All tiles with at least 12 spaces are Homestead tiles (Core: 2B, 3B, 4B, 6B, 8B; Hoth: 2B, 4B).
{-} At the end of each Round, the Imperial player gains {D} for each Homestead tile containing 1 or more fires.
{-} Healthy Rebel figures gain {A}: Choose 1 fire within 2 spaces of you and discard it. Then, if you are a hero, you may test {J}. If the test is passed, you may choose 1 additional fire within 2 spaces of you and discard it.
{-} The Rebels win when the Incinerator Troopers are defeated and there are no fires on the map.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: The remaining Imperial troops retreat back toward Mos Eisley, leaving the homestead in peace. Weeping with joy, the surviving farmers express profound gratitude to you for your assistance. {-} The Rebels win the mission! {-} Heroes receive the “Resurgence” Reward card. (This Reward card works differently when playing with Imperial Commander. Refer to the Rules Change section of the wiki documentation for details.) {-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero. {-} The Empire discards the “Constant Advantage” Reward card.

The fires continue to spread, and the Imperial reinforcements seem endless. You manage to reach your shuttle, and as it draws upward, you look back. The few buildings that remain standing are engulfed in flame, and you see no sign of any surviving civilians.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} The Empire discards the “Constant Advantage” Reward card.

Fanned on by the hot, dry desert winds of Tatooine, the fires spread.

{-} Choose 1 fire on tile CORE 2B. Place 1 fire in an empty space adjacent to it.

Fanned on by the hot, dry desert winds of Tatooine, the fires spread.

{-} Choose 1 fire on tile CORE 3B. Place 1 fire in an empty space adjacent to it.

Fanned on by the hot, dry desert winds of Tatooine, the fires spread.

{-} Choose 1 fire on tile CORE 4B. Place 1 fire in an empty space adjacent to it.

Fanned on by the hot, dry desert winds of Tatooine, the fires spread.

{-} Choose 1 fire on tile CORE 6B. Place 1 fire in an empty space adjacent to it.

Fanned on by the hot, dry desert winds of Tatooine, the fires spread.

{-} Choose 1 fire on tile CORE 8B. Place 1 fire in an empty space adjacent to it.

Fanned on by the hot, dry desert winds of Tatooine, the fires spread.

{-} Choose 1 fire on tile HOTH 2B. Place 1 fire in an empty space adjacent to it.

Fanned on by the hot, dry desert winds of Tatooine, the fires spread.

{-} Choose 1 fire on tile HOTH 4B. Place 1 fire in an empty space adjacent to it.

The Incinerator Trooper’s pack ruptures, sending a cascade of liquid fire in every direction!

{-} Roll 1 red die. All figures within 2 spaces of the Incinerator Trooper suffer {H} equal to the {H} results.
{-} When there are no fires on the map, click the blue highlight and select "Fires extinguished" to end the mission.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: {-} When there are no fires on the map, click "Fires extinguished" to end the mission.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent fires.
{-} When a figure enters a space containing a fire, that figure suffers 2 {H}. Figures cannot voluntarily end their movement in a space containing a fire.
{-} All tiles with at least 12 spaces are Homestead tiles (Core: 2B, 3B, 4B, 6B, 8B; Hoth: 2B, 4B).

eventActions.tbText: The wind has blown sparks all over the moisture farm. More fires spring to life.

eventActions.mainText:
How many Homestead tiles are there with 1 or more fires on them?

All tiles with at least 12 spaces are Homestead tiles (Core: 2B, 3B, 4B, 6B, 8B; Hoth: 2B, 4B).

inputList.theText: The fires are under control for now.
